channel.title: RS2 Models: Section rules [updated 05/31/2012]
channel.description:
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,354311.0.html]Global forum rules[/url] apply here as well. Read them, learn them.
[b]1)[/b] Please make your topic title follows [b][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,314359]this[/url][/b]. E.g. say you wanted to post a zamorak godsword model you made (haha original...) I would make the topic title Zamorak Godsword. Short and sweet, leave the long ass explanations for inside the topic.
[b]2)[/b] This section is only for models usable with the [b]RS2 Client[/b].
[b]3)[/b] Post your work and your work only, unless you have proof the original owner gave you permission to post it. In that case, be sure to cite the permission to credit the actual author(s).
[b]4)[/b] Recoloring items is acceptable as long as the original creator is accredited.
[b]5)[/b] All questions or requests related to modeling, using datmaker, any sort of modeler, or whatever else that's relevant should go in the Models Help/Request child board. Please do not request model IDs, only request user created models.
Any suggestions/rants about these current rules may be posted in this thread.
*Please note that the models and graphics sections are the only sections that allows requests

item.title: RS2 Models: Section rules [updated 05/31/2012]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I updated the topic. It seems there was a reference to a topic that no longer exists and the rules were ambiguous with the new graphics sections. All should be fine now. There were no actual changes to the rules, the topic was simply cleaned up a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: RS2 Models: Section rules [updated 05/31/2012]
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I have modified rule 5. Recoloring is now acceptable if and only if the original creator of the model is accredited appropriately. Failure to do so will break rule 4 and will result in worse than a lock. I personally find stealing someone else’s work one of the worst things you can possible do and I will personally not let people go off easy for it.

Read full topic

item.title: RS2 Models: Section rules [updated 05/31/2012]
item.dc:creator: @I_Samn_I I Samn I
item.description:
@I_Samn_I wrote:

[quote=“xxGRIMxxREAPERxx, post:9, topic:246011”]I got a good rule, because lots of people are posting threads and lots don’t know from looking at the title if its a release, tut, display of pics or what… maybe there should be tags (like I’ve seen lots of them with tags, but if all have them it would make it easier)
Example ( [Display] Grim Reaper’s Robe (you’re showing what you’ve made), [Released] Grim Reaper’s Robe (your releasing it to public), [Tut] Grim Reaper’s Robe (teaches how they made it, although i doubt someone would wanna teach how they made their own item, so this would be for tuts on how to make models I guess) ) and so on in the titles.

(this is my thought idk, you like rule or not?)[/quote]

Not the title tagging :s That was a big problem in tutorials

Read full topic

2) This section is only for models usable with the RS2 Client.

[/quote]

Do guitars count, even when they can be added into the client? :P[/quote]
Mhmm, as long as the client can use them, then it’s fine.

To anyone posting: please don’t post with “nice rules” etc, have something useful to say or a question to ask, I removed some of your posts. This is just spam and isn’t needed.

Read full topic
